metadata.dc:author: Figuerola, E
Lluansi, J
Llano, J A
Rosell, R
Dorca, J
Liern, M
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of squamous cell carcinoma of the lip with metástasis to the mandible and meningeal involvement causing multiple cranial nerve palsies. Biopsy proven metástasis to the mandible was demonstrated. Studies of CT scan of the head were negative. Extension through perineural space have been speculated.
metadata.dc:title: Manifestaciones inusuales del carcinoma escamoso de labio.
[Unusual manifestations of squamous carcinoma of the lip].
